Administration.name: setjoin
Administration.description: Sets the join channel, uses the default channel if not set

Administration.name: setlog
Administration.description: Sets the logging channel, uses the default channel if not set

Administration.name: setsuggestion
Administration.description: Sets the suggestion channel, uses the default channel if not set

Administration.name: setup
Administration.description: Sets up the bot for moderation like adding the muted roles and overriding channel permissions

Administration.name: getprefix
Administration.description: Displays the current prefix set for the current server

Administration.name: setprefix
Administration.description: Sets the current prefix for the server, prefix cannot be more than 3 characters long and cannot be composed of all letters/digits

Administration.name: settimemultiplier
Administration.description: Sets the time multiplier, multipliers include: S, M, H, D

Administration.name: getpreferences
Administration.description: Displays all the properties set for the server

Administration.name: addinvite
Administration.description: Adds an invite to the whitelist, only the owner can add invites

Administration.name: removeinvite
Administration.description: Removes an invite from the whitelist, only the owner can remove invites

Administration.name: whitelist
Administration.description: Displays all the whitelisted invites for the server

Welcome.name: disablewelcome
Welcome.description: Disables bot welcomes for new members

Welcome.name: enablewelcome
Welcome.description: Enables bot welcomes for new members

Welcome.name: getwelcomeenabled
Welcome.description: Displays whether bot welcomes are enabled or disabled

Welcome.name: getwelcomemessage
Welcome.description: Displays what the bot will print when a new member joins the server

Welcome.name: setwelcomemessage
Welcome.description: Sets the welcome message for new members
Welcome.example: setwelcomemessage Welcome to the server! Have a seat and make sure to read our rules!

Moderation.name: echo
Moderation.description: Echos a message into another channel, the message to echo cannot contain mentions
Moderation.example: echo #testing Hi, this is a test!

Moderation.name: nuke
Moderation.description: Nukes a certain number of messages, from 0 up to 99

Moderation.name: mute
Moderation.description: Mutes a user for a specified period of time, defaulted to minutes

Moderation.name: history
Moderation.description: Displays the history of a specific member, if no arguments are given, the invoker's history is retrieved

Moderation.name: strike
Moderation.syntax: strike { User ID/Mention } { Strike weight (0-3) } { Strike reason }

Moderation.name: warn
Moderation.description: Infracts a user with a 0 weight strike

Moderation.name: wiperecord
Moderation.description: Wipes the user's record from the database

Moderation.name: ban
Moderation.description: Bans a user/list of users (up to 30) from the server at once
Moderation.syntax: ban { User ID List (,) } { Ban Reason }

Moderation.name: unban
Moderation.description: Unbans a user and leaves a mark on their history

Moderation.name: gag
Moderation.description: Temporarily mutes a user for 5 minutes to allow moderators to handle an ongoing situation

Moderation.name: clearstrike
Moderation.description: Removes a strike from a user

Permission.name: setpermission
Permission.description: Sets the permission of a command to be available to a role and higher

Permission.name: setpermissioncategory
Permission.description: Sets the permission of all commands in a category to be available to the same role and higher

Permission.name: viewpermissions
Permission.description: Views all the permissions set in the server

Utility.name: help
Utility.description: Displays a help card for the user to learn more about a specific command, pass no arguments and it will display all commands available to you

Utility.name: invite
Utility.description: Displays all invite links related to me such as my development server and to invite me to your server

Utility.name: source
Utility.description: Displays all links related to my source code

Utility.name: changelog
Utility.description: Displays the latest changelog if no argument is given, displays a specific changelog if one can be found

Role.name: assign
Role.description: Assigns a role to the specified user, the role must not be higher than my role

Role.name: getjoinrole
Role.description: Displays the join role that will be assigned to new members on join in the server

Role.name: roles
Role.description: Displays all roles and their IDs in the server

Role.name: setjoinrole
Role.description: Sets the join role that will be assigned to new members on join in the server

Role.name: unassign
Role.description: Removes a role from the user, the role must not be higher than my role

Raid.name: setraidmessageduration
Raid.description: Sets how long the user messages are tracked in seconds for raid control

Raid.name: getraidmessagelimit
Raid.description: Displays how many user messages are tracked for raid control

Raid.name: setraidmessagelimit
Raid.description: Sets the number of user messages are tracked for raid control

Raid.name: getraidroleexcluded
Raid.description: Displays what roles are being excluded from raid filter

Raid.name: setraidroleexcluded
Raid.description: Sets the role that is being excluded from the raid filter, any role higher than this is also automatically excluded

Raid.name: getraidmessageduration
Raid.description: Displays how long user messages are tracked in seconds for raid control

Raid.name: viewraiders
Raid.description: Displays all the raiders in the server

Raid.name: freeraider
Raid.description: Removes a user from the raid list and unmutes them

Raid.name: freeallraiders
Raid.description: Removes all users from the raid list and unmutes them

Suggestion.name: poolinfo
Suggestion.description: Displays information about the suggestion pool

Suggestion.name: pooltop
Suggestion.description: Displays the latest suggestion in the pool

Suggestion.name: poolaccept
Suggestion.description: Accepts the latest suggestion in the pool

Suggestion.name: pooldeny
Suggestion.description: Denies the latest suggestion in the pool

Suggestion.name: suggest
Suggestion.description: Adds a suggestion to the suggestion pool

Suggestion.name: respond
Suggestion.syntax: respond { Suggestion Message ID } { Status (Accepted/Declined) } { Reason }

Macro.name: listmacros
Macro.description: Displays all the macros on the server

Macro.name: addmacro
Macro.description: Adds a macro to the server

Macro.name: editmacro
Macro.description: Edits an existing macro on the server
Macro.syntax: editmacro { Macro Name } { New Macro Description }

Macro.name: removemacro
Macro.description: Removes an existing macro from the server
